page.title: 09Recreation 2
page.content: {Cricket { }Cricket is played next to the Dam Close (see Local History pages).In the team are 11 players from Willoughby and the surrounding areas.The team is not very successful because they have not won many leagues or cups but they enjoy themselves.Mr.G.Bristow is the captain this season. {Tennis { }The tennis courts are at Weston's farm and Mrs.O.Weston runs them.The courts are hard-surface and enclosed by wire netting.The facility is pro- vided free of charge and it is also possible to borrow equipment. {Judo { }Judo is held once a week in the School hall.It is run by Mr.M.Sawyer who lives in Skegness and charges 30p for membership and the hour-and-a-half weekly sessions.
